title: Who Had The Bigger Loss?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and David Jacoby debate if Jalen Brunson would be a bigger loss for the Mavs or addition for the Knicks and how the Warriors should feel about Draymond’s latest comments.
